Source.Name: host-spawn
Source.Summary: Run commands on your host from inside your toolbox or flatpak sandbox
Source.Description: A reimplementation of flatpak-spawn --host. Run commands on your host machine from inside your flatpak sandbox, toolbox or distrobox containers.

Package.Name: host-spawn
Package.Summary: Run commands on your host from inside your toolbox or flatpak sandbox
Package.Description: A reimplementation of flatpak-spawn --host. Run commands on your host machine from inside your flatpak sandbox, toolbox or distrobox containers.
